Title: 12. Hello Singapore! pop-up
Description: 25th Apr-25th May  Image credit: @heartware.store via Instagram Although itâ€™s more of a store, the Hello Singapore! pop-up exhibition also displays artworks by a London-based illustrator known for vibrant sculptures and prints.
